languages.text: "Я отпущу вас. Мстить предателям или спасаться — ваш выбор".
"I shall let you go. It is up to you whether to flee or to seek vengeance."
languages.original_text: "Я отпущу вас. Мстить предателям или спасаться — ваш выбор".

traits.locale_text: "I will let you go. It is up to you whether to escape or seek vengeance."
"I will let you go. It is up to you whether to escape or seek vengeance."
"I shall let you go. It is up to you whether to flee or to seek vengeance."
"I shall let you go. It is up to you whether to flee or to seek vengeance."
"I shall let you go. It is up to you whether to flee or to seek vengeance."
"I shall let you go. It is up to you whether to flee or to seek vengeance."

languages.text: «Os dejaré marchar. Sois libres de huir o buscar venganza».
languages.original_text: "I shall let you go. It is up to you whether to flee or to seek vengeance."

traits.locale_text: «Os dejaré marchar. Sois libres de huir o buscar venganza».

languages.text: 「逃がしてやろう。逃げるか、復讐を果たすかは君次第だ」
languages.original_text: "I shall let you go. It is up to you whether to flee or to seek vengeance."

traits.locale_text: 「逃がしてやろう。逃げるか、復讐を果たすかは君次第だ」

languages.text: “我饶你们一命。你们是打算逃跑，还是打算报仇，看你们自己怎么选吧。”
languages.original_text: "I shall let you go. It is up to you whether to flee or to seek vengeance."

traits.locale_text: “我饶你们一命。你们是打算逃跑，还是打算报仇，看你们自己怎么选吧。”

languages.text: "Ich lasse Euch gehen. Es liegt an Euch, ob Ihr flieht oder nach Rache strebt."
languages.original_text: "I shall let you go. It is up to you whether to flee or to seek vengeance."

traits.locale_text: "Ich lasse Euch gehen. Es liegt an Euch, ob Ihr flieht oder nach Rache strebt."

languages.text: « Je vous laisse partir. Il ne tient qu'à vous de fuir ou de chercher à vous venger. »
languages.original_text: "I shall let you go. It is up to you whether to flee or to seek vengeance."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous laisse partir. Il ne tient qu'à vous de fuir ou de chercher à vous venger. »

languages.text: "Gitmenize müsaade edeceğim. İster kaçın ister intikam arayın."
languages.original_text: "I shall let you go. It is up to you whether to flee or to seek vengeance."
